channel.title: [PI] Developer Rank [PI]
channel.description: okay so recently iv added developer rank, and i dont think iv done it right...because when i yell it says "DEVELOPER" but it doesnt have every right as owner...so in other words how do i make it so developer rank (character rights 5) gets the same exact rights and other stuff as the owner. i would love you forever thanks.

item.title: [PI] Developer Rank [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

Give up coding if u cant figure this out peace.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Developer Rank [PI]
item.dc:creator: @im_cool12 im cool12
item.description:
@im_cool12 wrote:

wait im confused i think i already have that…do you have teamviewer?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Developer Rank [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

go to command .java
and add this

   if (c.playerRights == 3) 
        ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);

under if (c.playerRights == 4) DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand); and assuming you already have custom yelling setup you just change the tag :3

Read full topic
